author: Danyal Rasool
title: Playing cricket in empty stadiums will be 'strange' - Imam-ul-Haq
description: The Pakistan opener believes the charm of cricket exists because of fans at venues | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Pakistan opener Imam-ul-Haq is sceptical of playing international cricket without fans at venues, terming it "strange". He believed it would see much of cricket's charm lost, particularly if the T20 World Cup, scheduled to begin in October in Australia, was p… [+4571 chars]
